Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Azimilide , however , significantly prolonged APD and QT interval at concentrations from 0 . 1 to 10 micromol / L but shortened them at 30 micromol / L .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Long QT Syndrome (prolonged QT interval) |
| Short QT Syndrome (shortened QT interval) |

The paragraph mentions the effects of Azimilide on the APD (Action Potential Duration) and QT interval. These effects can be considered symptoms of Long QT Syndrome (prolonged QT interval) and Short QT Syndrome (shortened QT interval), respectively.
